title: Sophisticated Great Ocean Road Spa Escape with Daily Breakfast, Spa Credit & Heated Outdoor Pool
description:
Between kangaroo-filled bushland and Victoria’s spectacular coastline stands the family-friendly Great Ocean Road Resort, perfectly positioned in the picturesque town of Anglesea. Just a 10-minute drive from Torquay, the region’s most iconic surf spot, the resort offers everything you need to explore the lush eucalyptus rainforests, pristine limestone beaches and exceptional local producers along one of Australia’s most beloved tourist routes. Return to a soul-warming heated indoor pool, top-notch treatments at Lux Spa & Wellness and modern Australian plates made with hand-picked native ingredients at The Coast.

Journey just two hours to reach the jaw-dropping Twelve Apostles or savour Anglesea’s abundance of delights, including cosy cafes, upscale boutiques, a beautiful beach, Anglesea Golf Club and some of Victoria’s best bushwalks.
offer_address: 105 Great Ocean Rd, Anglesea 3230 VIC Australia

title: Grand Opening: Retro-Inspired Bright Boutique Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Introducing the brand-new Hara House, Bright's only boutique hotel. Retro-inspired glamour awaits, with 22 luxurious adult-only rooms nestled in the heart of Victoria's High Country. Picture your perfect escape within mid-century interiors decorated with graphic designs and bold furnishings - celebrate the local producers, lounge by the sandstone kidney-shaped pool and enjoy refreshing cocktails at your fingertips. Indulge your palate at the five-star Pepperberry, the stylish onsite restaurant, helmed by celebrated chef Yasuaki Tokuda, showcasing reimagined Australian classics crafted from local produce and native ingredients.

Bright serves as the ideal base for exploring the alpine valley villages of Wandiligong and Harrietville, as well as historic Beechworth. Explore summer cycling and walking trails with access to Mount Buffalo National Park, and hit the slopes in winter at Mount Hotham. But you don't need to venture far for entertainment at this eclectic haven -  a range of activities awaits, from lawn games and tennis on the private court to leisurely bike rides and dips in the sparkling mineral pool and spa.

vendor_name: DNU Warrenmang Vineyard and Resort INACTIVE
title: Tranquil Getaway to Victoria's Wine Country
description: Escape to wine country and discover the majestic beauty of Victoria's Pyrenees Region with two nights at the popular Warrenmang Vineyard & Resort - a five-star James Halliday-rated winery. Includes an in-room breakfast pack, a guided tour of the resort’s underground cellar and a wine tasting, daily drink for each guest, complimentary Warrenmang VIP Club Membership and a late 2pm checkout. Plus up to two kids stay free!
offer_address: 188 Mountain Creek Rd, Moonambel Victoria 3478, Australia

title: Cosy Port of Echuca Mercure Stay with Daily Breakfast
description: Between the languid Murray River and the sprawling red gum bush, Mercure Port of Echuca offers guests the perfect base to discover the town’s charming steamboat history and quirky boutiques, all just a three-hour drive from Melbourne. With Echuca’s major tourist attractions all within easy strolling distance, you’ll be all set for a truly cosy family-friendly escape - glide down the Murray on the antique paddleboat steamer PS Canberra, step back in time as you wander through the historic High Street boulevard and savour some of Australia’s best bushwalks. Return to your comfortable retreat and lazy afternoons by Mercure Port of Echuca's refreshing outdoor pool.

title: Luxe Heritage Stay on Victoria’s Bellarine Peninsula
description: Enjoy a coastal getaway on Victoria’s Bellarine Peninsula at the number-one B&B in Queenscliff: Athelstane House. The beautiful 1860s exterior has been lovingly maintained, while an interior renovation provides all the luxurious comforts a discerning traveller expects. Wake up to daily à la carte breakfast, enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival and relax with a late 12 noon checkout.

title: Great Ocean Road Adults-Only Apartment Escape in the Heart of Lorne with Welcome Wine
description: Immerse yourself in the Great Ocean Road’s iconic seaside charm with a boutique stay at the newly refurbished Lorne Surf Apartments, located in the heart of one of Victoria’s most spectacular coastal towns. Comfortable, light-filled rooms brim with undeniable Australian charm and offer unparalleled access to Victoria's best-loved region - bushwalk through the mighty Great Otway National Park, head north and hang ten at the world-famous Bells Beach or strike out to the Twelve Apostles for truly soul-soaring views. Return to your private retreat and Lorne’s dazzling collection of latte-pouring cafes, laidback boutiques and local sea baths.

title: Vibrant South Yarra Apartments near Chapel Street with Rooftop Terrace
description: From stylish boutiques to lively restaurants and bars, the inner-city suburb of South Yarra offer something for everyone. Experience the excitement firsthand with a stylish stay at Oaks Melbourne South Yarra Suites - saunter along Chapel Street or Toorak Road and shop ‘til you drop, get your caffeine fix at any of the ubiquitous cafés Melbourne is famous for or pull up a chair at one of the many restaurants nearby. Venture a little further to the Royal Botanic Gardens and Shrine of Remembrance or hop on the tram or train to easily reach the CBD, where stencilled laneways await you. After a long day of discovery, settle back for a spectacular sunset view on the hotel’s rooftop terrace for a peaceful finish to your day, or retreat to your stylish studio apartment with a kitchenette and private balcony.

title: Vibrant Melbourne Southbank Escape with Glistening Swimming Pool
description: From world-renowned sporting events to graffitied laneways lined with exquisite restaurants and boutiques, to must-see art galleries and museums, Melbourne has something for everyone - and WRAP on Southbank is the perfect launchpad to unearth the city's delights. Take your pick from a stylish studio or modern apartment abode and enjoy an impeccable list of onsite facilities including a shimmering pool, undercover secure parking and a fully equipped fitness centre. While the wonders of Melbourne's lively neighbourhoods may tempt you away from your inner-city base, you can also find exceptional eateries along the Yarra River from Southgate to the Crown Entertainment Complex, maritime adventures at Polly Woodside or treat yourself to a new outfit at DFO South Wharf.
